title: Appropriates monies for funding day care services to children of persons 24 and under to enable such persons to continue education
summary: Provides funds for day care services for the children of persons 24 and under to enable such persons to continue secondary and post-secondary education; provides criteria to be governed by standard established for economically and educationally disadvantaged students under special opportunity programs for state and city universities; appropriates $5,600,000 to the office of children and family services therefor.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to day care services and making an appropriation therefor
